TopicTitle: Legacy Parts [XX.X] TO Beta CFG Patches

Articles.Content:
I got to thinking yesterday when I was struggling with some beautiful parts that they didn't play nicely with all up-to-date or new mods. In most cases the problems could be fixed if a CFG file was updated.

I would be willing to start and maintain a repository of links to updated files, BUT the links must follow all the developer's release rules.

Here are a couple of simple examples:

AIES [.23] to Antenna Range

AIES [.23] to Remote Tech

AIES [.23] to Landing Legs Patch

AIES [.23] to Hot Rockets

Interstellar [.25] to [.90] Patch

It should probably be in a table format but I wanted to see if there was any interest before starting it.

Edited December 27, 2014 by Probus
Updated a patch

Somewhere in the Aies Furom there are some patchs for the legs that, I did sometime back, I was getting a error when they deployed so patched them to us just FS or stock ModuleAnimateGeneric and also have 1 for the legs that use a

old plugin called Foundations that still works it will hold you in place and the legs don't have the suspension on them.

EDIT- Or are you saying there is something wrong with my patches that you post ?
Not at all MeCripp. I am just gathering patches from everyone that update legacy parts to work in Beta. If you could link me your post with the AIES legs patch, I will add it to the list.

K just checking didn't know if, I needed to look closer at a patch or not but here are the leg patchs https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/72893034/Aies_LEG_PATCH_FS.cfg.zip and https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/72893034/Aies_LEG_PATCH.cfg.zip and here is just a craft examples https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/72893034/Aies_Craft_Test.zip, I didn't post the one with the Foundations plugin but if you want it can find the post for the plugin and link it to and the patch.

EDIT- Here is a post that has all of them, I think http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/35383-0-23-AIES-Aerospace-v1-5-1?p=1425987&viewfull=1#post1425987

EDIT- Here is a link to HotRockets for Aies http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/65754-HotRockets%21-Particle-FX-Replacement-Tutorial?p=1582411&viewfull=1#post1582411
